newsitem.title: USA: Evergreen Media files for 8 mln shr offer.
newsitem.headline: Evergreen Media files for 8 mln shr offer.

text.p: Evergreen Media Corp said on Friday it has filed a registration statement with the Securities and Exchange Commission for a public offering of eight million class A common shares.
All of the shares will be sold by the company in the proposed offering, Evergreen said.
Proceeds will be used to reduce borrowings under its senior credit facility, Evergreen said. The available credit would then be used to fund further acquisitions, the company said.

Evergreen Media said Alex. Brown & Sons is the lead underwriter. CS First Boston, Donaldson Lufkin & Jenrette Securities, Morgan Stanley, Smith Barney and UBS Securities are also underwriters, Evergreen said.
Underwriters have received options to buy up to an additional 1.2 million shares to cover any over-allotments, Evergreen said.
